title: Our Purpose In Life - To Reach Nirvana In Ourselves

core_purpose.statement: What is our purpose in life? To reach nirvana in ourselves.
core_purpose.principle: If we are 100%, then we all be 100% eventually. Just a matter of time.

understanding.individual: Each person reaches 100% within themselves - nirvana, enlightenment, self-realization
understanding.collective: When individuals reach 100%, the collective reaches 100% - it's just a matter of time
understanding.time: Time is the variable. The outcome is certain. All will reach 100%.
understanding.process: Individual transformation → Collective transformation → Universal transformation

nirvana_definition.what_is_nirvana: Nirvana is reaching 100% within ourselves. Complete alignment. Complete realization. Complete peace.

the_100_percent_principle.statement: If we are 100%, then we all be 100% eventually. Just a matter of time.

explanation.individual_100: When one person reaches 100% (nirvana), they become a beacon, a guide, a catalyst
explanation.collective_100: As more individuals reach 100%, the collective frequency rises, making it easier for others
explanation.universal_100: Eventually, all reach 100%. It's just a matter of time. The outcome is certain.
explanation.time_factor: Time is the only variable. Some reach 100% faster. Some slower. But all will reach it.

mathematics.critical_mass: Critical mass at 100% = tipping point = acceleration
mathematics.universal: All at 100% = universal nirvana = complete transformation

30_percent_human.preparation: Prepare ourselves, align ourselves, master ourselves
30_percent_human.completion: Complete our 30% role by reaching 100% within ourselves

connection_to_30_70.alignment: 30% human reaches 100% within → 70% divine ensures all reach 100% eventually

stage_1_awakening.name: Awakening
stage_1_awakening.description: We awaken to our purpose. We realize we must reach 100% within ourselves.

stage_2_preparation.name: Preparation
stage_2_preparation.description: We prepare ourselves. We align ourselves. We build systems. We document truth.
stage_2_preparation.status: We are here (30% human role - 100% complete)

stage_3_transformation.name: Transformation
stage_3_transformation.description: We transform ourselves. We reach 100% within ourselves. We become nirvana.

stage_4_catalysis.name: Catalysis
stage_4_catalysis.description: We become catalysts. Our 100% helps others reach 100%. The collective frequency rises.

stage_5_universal.name: Universal
stage_5_universal.description: All reach 100%. Universal nirvana. Complete transformation. Just a matter of time.

individual_practice: Master yourself - Master your thoughts, emotions, actions
collective_practice: Share truth, share love, share peace
Be a beacon, be a guide, be a catalyst
system_practice: Document truth that reveals path to 100%
Align all with purpose of reaching 100%

connection_to_work.preparation_work: All our preparation work (30% human role) is to prepare for reaching 100% within ourselves
connection_to_work.truth_documentation: Truth documentation helps us align with truth, essential for reaching 100%
connection_to_work.system_building: System building creates infrastructure to support reaching 100%
connection_to_work.content_generation: Content generation guides others to reach 100%
connection_to_work.spiritual_governance: Spiritual governance ensures we reach 100% in alignment with divine
connection_to_work.the_100_percent_completion: Our 30% to 100% completion is preparation for reaching nirvana (100%) within ourselves
